definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
to bleed/bleeding/(fig.) to spend money in large amounts
to make blood (function of bone marrow)

sentences.english: E. coli O157:H7 causes abdominal cramping, vomiting and a diarrheal illness, often with bloody stools.
sentences.chinese: H7能引起腹部绞痛，呕吐和腹泻，通常是血便。

sentences.english: Here are the slips for blood test and fluoroscopic examination.
sentences.chinese: 这些是化验血和做胸透的申请单。

sentences.english: Buy stocks when there is bloodshed in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街头溅血，就是买股票的时机。

sentences.english: Like lions we tow the line, blood-sewn pact with truth inside.
sentences.chinese: 我们像狮子一样拖行，血缝制协定真理内。

sentences.english: Objective To study the changes of somatostatin in uterus and blood of mouse during genesis cycle.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小鼠生殖周期子宫和血生长抑素的变化。

sentences.english: Wash me, cleanse me in the blood That flowed from Calvary.
sentences.chinese: 求你所流宝贝血，洗净我众罪孽。

sentences.english: Key work in understanding the problems of using animal blood for human transfusions was provided by Ponfick and Landois.
sentences.chinese: 颇费克和兰德思发现了给人输注动物血的关键问题。

sentences.english: Iago . I bleed, sir; but not kill'd.
sentences.chinese: 伊阿古我不过流了点儿血，还没有给他杀死。

sentences.english: However, sensitive spots can be found there as well.
sentences.chinese: 但是也有一些敏感部位血很多。

sentences.english: My head throbbed. There was blood all over the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我的脑袋悸跳着作痛，雪地上到处都是血。

sentences.english: Without enough blood, you can't cool off.
sentences.chinese: 如果血容量不足，人体便无法冷下来。
血把她的头发粘在一起。

sentences.english: Trypanosoma brucei is the hemoflagellate that causes sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 布氏锥虫是一种造成嗜睡症的血鞭毛虫。

sentences.english: Objective Understanding ingredient blood of feeding in unite rescuing traffic incidents curative effect observing.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解成分血联合输注抢救交通伤的疗效观察。

sentences.english: Egypt's clean water had been sullied with blood by the hand of the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 那时，上帝伸手让埃及的干净水变成血。

sentences.english: She held her head high as a small trickle of blood ran down from her bruised knee.
sentences.chinese: 她高高扬起头，青肿的膝盖上一滴血慢慢流下来。

definition: to bleed/bleeding/(fig.) to spend money in large amounts
coma caused by loss of blood/fainting at the sight of blood/Taiwan pr. [xie3 yun1]
